S

ScrollPanel - Class in pente
This class is used as a message area and is displayed on a parchment scroll in the Pente game.
ScrollPanel() - Constructor for class pente.ScrollPanel
Creates a new ScrollPanel with no message.

Sets the background of this GridView to the specified image.
